reviews.review_msg: come on people-what are you at university for?  yeh, she's tough, but i learned more in one semester than i ever have before. if you want an easy grade, go somewhere else. if you want to be pushed by someone who cares, take this prof

To say she is a hard marker is an understatement. It would help if she told you what she wanted before she chops your paper to pieces. Also thinks her opinion is somehowm more valuable cause she's the prof. I think she needs a girlfriend.
